artist: Artist: Frank Gaard , et al., artists; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 16 pages, saddle-stapled; black-and-white publication with "Art Police" in handwritten-type letters near the top and heavy black border around image; central image has 2 round headed people with person on left holding key in PR hand; key is being fitted into the keyhole mouth of the person at right; some inside pages are cover images from other issued; 2 color cardstock insert and b/w photocopy (?) insert
title: Artpolice
